name: Sending malformed JSON to add-tracks endpoint should return 400 Bad Request
description: Simulates a malformed JSON body and validates that Spotify returns a structured 400 error.
descriptionHtml: Simulates a malformed JSON body and validates that Spotify returns a structured 400 error.
statusMessage:
Expected: "Invalid access token"
     but: was "No token provided"
